turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Pam, how are you? I'm in need of a favor? Could you please order me a coffee drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where would you like me to order it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, I have an appointment in Shiloh, IL. so maybe that location would be an idea location.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, do you know what you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Umm, it's either a latte or a frappucino?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Well, let me know what you decide?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What drink do you like from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I usually order tea from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, I think I want a Grande Iced Caramel Brulee Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay would you like anything specific or should i just say a Grande Iced Caramel?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, I would like whole milk, and and an extra shot of espresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay so that's a Grande Iced Caramel Brulee Latte with whole milk and an extra shot of espresso.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, did you decide on the location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I believe the Shiloh, Illinois location would be the closest one to my appoinment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what time would you like me to order the drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I have to be at my appointment at noon, so you can order my drink at 11:30 a.m.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I will do that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You do have my Starbucks card with you for my rewards?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes and I have your store card with me.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks they will send me my receipt via my telephone.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I will make sure of that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You are the best.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I know. I will call the order in for you to pick it up at 11:30 a.m.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will be ordering a Grande Iced Caramel Brulee Latte with whole milk and an extra shot of espresso at the Shiloh, IL. location for you to pick up at 11:30am.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You are correct. Thanks again.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. Have a great day.
